MatcherFilter

public MatcherFilter(RouteMatcher routeMatcher,
                     boolean isServletContext)
Constructor

参数：
routeMatcher - The route matcher
isServletContext - If true, chain.doFilter will be invoked if request is not consumed by Spark.
